channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Photo taken today. Looks like old tarmac, soil and broken crockery.

item.title: Overgrown hedge, 14th July
item.description:
The hedge surrounding the bowls club is very overgrown and an force you off the footpath and into the road. This could be very dangerous, especially for a deaf or partially sighted person. The club should be required to maintain the correct width of footpath.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Suffolk Square, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped, 13th July
item.description:
A load of rubbish has been dumped - again - in this layby. Could you please put up a sign warning of CCTV even if it doesn't exist to deter the litter louts?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Flight Farm Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton Hill

item.title: Huge potholes and protruding rocks across entrance to car park, 11th July
item.description:
Huge potholes across whole of entrance to Kilkenny Viewpoint car park plus large protruding rocks 3" high. Underside of car damaged. Noticed the leak after got home just a couple of mins drive from viewpoint so hopefully engine not ruined! Went back later to take photos and oil can be clearly seen in the pothole lakes. Car currently draining its remaining oil into trays! Please fill potholes before someone else gets their car ruined.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A436, Andoversford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obstructing use of pavement., 10th July
item.description:
Yet another skip overhanging onto the pavement along with an overgrown hedge. Seriously impeding passage along the pavement especially for the elderly, disabled and mothers with prams.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 55a Alstone Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
